content: knitted jumper in drops belle piece is knitted top down with round yoke lace pattern leaf pattern and short balloon sleeves pattern vs-078 yarn group b **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops belle from garnstudio 250-300-300-350-350-400 g colour 02 off white **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm **needles** drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 and 60 or 80 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for edges
